id.description: Container id (can also be used to retrieve the resource in the /cloud api).

region.description: The cloud region which the container belongs to.

efiBootloaderPath.description: Path of the EFI bootloader from the OS installed on the server

diskGroupId.description: Disk group id (default is 0, meaning automatic)

hardwareRaid.description: Hardware Raid configurations (if not specified, all disks of the chosen disk group id will be configured in JBOD mode)

disks.description: Total number of disks in the disk group involved in the hardware raid configuration (all disks of the disk group by default)

spares.description: Number of disks in the disk group involved in the spare (default is 0)

disks.description: Total number of disks in the disk group involved in the partitioning configuration (all disks of the disk group by default)

layout.description: Custom partitioning layout (default is the default layout of the operating system's default partitioning scheme)

schemeName.description: Partitioning scheme (if applicable with selected operating system)

size.description: Partition size in MiB (default value is 0 which means to fill the disk with that partition)

name.description: zpool name (generated automatically if not specified, note that multiple ZFS partitions with same zpool names will be configured as multiple datasets belonging to the same zpool if compatible)

tags.description: Resource tags. Tags that were internally computed are prefixed with ovh:

value.description: Value to use in order to filter tags

license.WindowsSqlVersionEnum.description: All SQL Server versions for Windows products

subDomain.description: The subdomain to add on your DNS zone for the domain

secondaryDns.SecondaryDNSNameServer.description: A structure describing informations about available nameserver for secondary dns

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

canDeleteAtExpiration.description: Indicates that the service can be set up to be deleted at expiration

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

vrack.TaskStatusEnum.description: All states a vRack Task can be in
